Source.Name: wesnoth
Source.Summary: A turn-based strategy game on a fantasy world
Source.Description: The Battle for Wesnoth is a Free, turn-based tactical strategy game with a high fantasy theme, featuring both single-player, and online/hotseat multiplayer combat. Fight a desperate battle to reclaim the throne of Wesnoth, or take hand in any number of other adventures.

Package.Name: wesnoth
Package.Summary: A turn-based strategy game on a fantasy world
